contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Zanè | official_name = Comune di Zanè | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Zanè-Stemma.svg | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 43 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 11 |longm = 28 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = {{RegioneIT|sigla=VEN}} | province = {{ProvinciaIT (short form)|sigla=VI}} (VI) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 7.64 | population_footnotes = <ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics from the Italian statistical institute ([[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]])</ref> | population_total = 6615 | population_as_of = 28 February 2009 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Zanadiensi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_m = 183 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = Santi [[San Giuseppe]] | day = 19 March | postal_code = 36010 | area_code = 0445 | website = {{official website|http://www.comune.zane.vi.it/}} | footnotes = <!-- These are currently unused --> | istat = 024119 | fractions = [[Carrè]], [[Marano Vicentino]], [[Piovene Rocchette]], [[Santorso]], [[Schio]], [[Thiene]], [[Zugliano]] | fiscal_code = M145 }} '''Zanè''' is a town in the [[province of Vicenza]], [[Veneto]], [[Italy]]. It is north and south of SP349. As of 2007 Zanè had an estimated population of 6,553.<ref name="world gazetteer">{{cite web | url=http://www.world-gazetteer.com/wg.php?men=gpro&des=gamelan&geo=488611145 | title=The World Gazetteer | accessdate=2007-02-20}}</ref> ==Sources== *[http://maps.google.com/maphp?hl=en&ned=us&tab=nl&q=Zanè,%20Italy (Google Maps)] <references/> {{Province of Vicenza}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zane}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Veneto]] {{Veneto-geo-stub}}
